items.sentence: Tom told me that I should eat at that restaurant.
Tom told me that he was planning to go to Boston.
Tom took care of our dog while we were in Boston.
I\'ve found some of the things I was looking for.
I\'ve got a lot of stories that I could tell you.
I\'ve lost thirty pounds since I started my diet.
Why didn\'t you tell me you knew how to fix this?
Why didn\'t you tell me you were going to Boston?
Do you really think that you\'re fooling anybody?
Look, if you still want to go, I won\'t stop you.
